# Visualizing Data

```{r}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(gridExtra)
data("anscombe")
d <- anscombe
rm(anscombe)

source("R/plot_anscombe.R")

p1 <- plot_anscombe(d, "x1", "y1")
p2 <- plot_anscombe(d, "x2", "y2")
p3 <- plot_anscombe(d, "x3", "y3")
p4 <- plot_anscombe(d, "x4", "y4")

grid.arrange(p1, p2, p3, p4, ncol = 2)

```
